name: Pablo Filomeno
title: Product Marketing Manager
bio: Pablo is the Product Marketing Manager of FlowFuse. With a background in strategic communications and a passion for making complex technologies accessible, his mission is to help industrial and software teams discover the power of FlowFuse to transform their operations.
facts: Tech founder who also run 2 marketing agencies, now turned into a Masterâ€™s Degree Neuromarketing Professor.
Spent 10 years rocking out with my band with 3 albums and a whole world of gigs, fun and stories.
Big fan of live music, video games and enjoying long walks with my dogs.
